description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork With Mulled Cherries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Pork With Mulled Cherries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, 3 strips of zest removed with a peeler

recipeInstructions.text: Slice pork and arrange on a platter with baby rocket. Spoon over mulled cherries. Cut crackling into pieces and serve with pork.
